Let's talk
We turn ideas into impactful web and mobile solutions. By blending strategy with innovative design, we create seamless, high-performing digital experiences that help brands grow and adapt in an evolving landscape.
Selected Projects
View All
Zain Cash Website
The Zain Cash Website is a state-of-the-art platform reshaping Iraq's digital payment landscape, providing users with a secure and flexible way to manage their finances.
Websites
Arab Islamic Bank Website
A dynamic website for Arab Islamic Bank, enhancing customer engagement and reflecting their commitment to Islamic financial principles.
Websites
KIA Palestine Website
Crafted for KIA Palestine, this website delivers a seamless digital journey, highlighting their vehicle lineup and services through a sleek, user-centric design.
Websites
Palestine for Credit and Development - FATEN App
The FATEN app delivers essential financial services to Palestinian communities, enhanced by an intuitive, user-friendly interface crafted by Blue for Information Technology.

About Us
Home
About Us
The National Insurance Company was founded in 1992, and it began its operations on March 1, 1993. The company was established by a group of Palestinian business people and experienced individuals during an early stage of political and economic development. They set a clear goal to make national insurance an economic institution, built on the national capital and relying on the expertise of the country's citizens who gained valuable experience through years of work abroad. This institution enjoys the support of generous people who aspire to self-reliance in building their future and present. After more than thirty-one years, the goal of national insurance remains to consistently provide the best insurance services to the Palestinian people
Our Vision and Mission
Our Vision
We strive for our insurance services to be the preferred choice for every Palestinian through our leadership in local markets and the alignment of digitalization, quality, and modern technology
Our Mission
Providing innovative and digital insurance services with competitive pricing and high quality through creativity
Our Values
Innovation
We strive to enhance insurance services through their tools and maximize the capabilities of our professional staff
Creativity
We present our work with everything that is new and unexpected
Respect
Through our commitment to professional and ethical conduct in all our relationships
Excellence
We excel in accomplishing our work and deliver it with the highest quality
Flexibility
We carry out our work with flexibility and high efficiency, making bold decisions
Credibility
We provide our services with honesty, proficiency, and professionalism
Our Goals
We strive diligently to achieve a set of key goals that enable us to provide the best insurance service to our clients and achieve mutual success
Product Development
Enhancing Customer Experience
Developing and improving the efficiency of sales channels
Enhancing Financial Efficiency
Digital Transformation and System Development
Cost Reduction

العربية
Travel Insurance
Home
General Insurances
Individual Services
Travel Insurance
Welcome to the online insurance service. Once you finish filling out the application, a National Insurance Company employee will contact you within 24 working hours to complete providing the service to you
Apply
Have you decided to travel?
Have you decided in your destination?
Wherever you want to travel and wherever your destination is, do not worry about sudden changes or events that may disturb your travel. The National Insurance Company works to ensure your comfort and ensure these variables so that you stay happy... and go and return safely.
Features of the “Travel Insurance” program
Covering medical treatment expenses for emergency and sudden cases up to $50,000.
Compensation for cancellation or delay of a scheduled flight.
Compensation for loss of travel bags or delayed arrival of bags and luggage.
Compensation in the event that the insured suffers a total disability resulting from a sudden and unexpected accident.
Covering the expenses of transporting or returning the insured after an accident or sudden illness.
Provides 24/7 assistance by calling +97022416111
You can request insurance now through our employees in all branches, or you can contact us through our pages on social media sites, through the website, or by calling the service center at the number #25
Or via WhatsApp at the number: +970562000002
Apply

Health Insurance
Welcome to the online insurance service. Once you finish filling out the application, a National Insurance Company employee will contact you within 24 working hours to complete providing the service to you.
Apply
Keep you and your family safe with the strongest individual health insurance coverage!
Now you can get health insurance for you and your family members at the best prices from the National Insurance Company.
With health insurance from National Insurance.
There are many options for health coverage that suit your needs, with coverage up to 100% of the value of treatment and medical bills.
Special and preferential prices for families.
A wide and distinguished medical network through the Nat Health card.
You can request insurance now through our employees in all branches, or you can contact us through our pages on social media sites, through the website, or by calling the service center at the number #25
Or via WhatsApp at the number: +970562000002

تأمين السيارات
أفضل الخدمات التأمينية المتعلقة بالمركبات والتي تعمل على تغطية كافة الأضرار التي قد تلحق بالمركبة
التأمينات العامة
أكثر من 30 منتجاً تأمينياً من المخاطر والتحديات والأحداث المُفاجئة , و التي تؤثر على الممتلكات أو المحلات التجارية أو حتى على الطرف الثالث
التأمين الصحي
أفضل الخدمات التأمينية المتعلقة بالتأمين الصحي للأفراد والعائلات ضمن أفضل وأضخم شبكة طبية للتأمين الصحي
تأمين السفر
نقدم لكم أفضل الخدمات التأمينية المتعلقة في تأمين السفر إلى أي دولة من دول العالم والتي تعمل على التعويض في حال تعرضكم إلى أحد الأخطار الطارئة
التأمين للأفراد والشركات
نقدم حلاً شاملاً لتأمين الأفراد والشركات ، مع خيارات مخصصة تلبي احتياجات الجميع ضمن أكثر من 30 منتجاً تأمنينياً لخدمتكم
خدمات الأفراد
خدمات تأمينية للأفراد التي من خلالها يتم تقديم خيارات متعددة وخدمات متخصصة مناسبة , ومتوافقة مع حاجاته ومتطلباته الشخصية

Cars Insurance
Welcome to the online insurance service. Once you finish filling out the application, a National Insurance Company employee will contact you within 24 working hours to complete providing the service to you
Apply
 We offer you the utmost flexibility in choosing the appropriate insurance coverage that is compatible with your personal needs, which works to help you cover all the damages caused to your car through various insurance coverage such as compulsory, third party, and comprehensive insurance. Therefore, we always strive to provide you with the best and fastest services, which reduces disruption to your daily life. 
Features of the "car insurance" program:
Physical compensation includes any driver who has a driving license that authorizes him to drive a vehicle according to the law. As for material compensation, it includes any driver who is more than 24 years old and whose license has been issued for more than a year. Otherwise, the driver must be added to the insurance.
Insurance includes accidents resulting from traffic violations under special conditions.
The third party's liability limits for Palestinian vehicles are 150,000 shekels and can be raised up to 500,000 shekels by paying an additional fee. As for vehicles carrying the yellow tiger, the liability limits are 500,000 shekels, and the insured can raise the liability limits in exchange for an additional premium according to the policy approved by the company.
Insurance coverage includes all areas of the West Bank, Gaza, and the occupied Palestinian interior.
The company provides the largest network of repair centers in all governorates of Palestine, and the insured is given the freedom to choose a repair garage within the policy approved by the company.
The telephone service center is available to report incidents 24/7 through the call center at #25
   Subject to the terms of the policy
You can request insurance now through our employees in all branches, or you can contact us through our pages on social media sites, through the website, or by calling the service center on the number #25
Or via WhatsApp on the number: +970562000002
